pullRequest.title: Fix NPE in OCFileListFragment when OCFile is null
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixed NPE
Audited all use of nullable field in all called APIs
Updated called APIs nullability documentation

Signed-off-by: Chris Narkiewicz hello@ezaquarii.com

 No test as this is a speculative fix for a tricky edge case + audit changes

commit.message:
Fix NPE in OCFileListFragment when OCFile is null

1. Fixed NPE
2. Audited all use of nullable field in all called APIs
3. Updated called APIs nullability documentation

Fixes #6282

Signed-off-by: Chris Narkiewicz <hello@ezaquarii.com>

Root folder should also just be a OCFile? 🤔
